tool.name: Validate
tool.help:
**Description**
.. image:: http://www.cellorganizer.org/galaxy/images/ome_logo.png
| | Validates an OME.TIFF file using BioFormats_ command line tools_.
-----
**Input**
* An OME.TIFF file.
-----
**Options**
* No options are needed
-----
**Output**
* If the validator returns true, then this tool reports the file as a valid OME.TIFF. False, otherwise.
.. _BioFormats: http://www.openmicroscopy.org/site/products/bio-formats .. _tools: http://www.openmicroscopy.org/site/support/bio-formats5.5/users/comlinetools
